start.commands:
printf 'Launching Nginx
' >> SERVICE_PREFIX/service.log 2>&1
SERVICE_ROOT/exports/nginx -c SERVICE_PREFIX/service.conf && printf 'Nginx started
' >> SERVICE_PREFIX/service.log 2>&1

stop.commands:
SERVICE_ROOT/exports/nginx -c SERVICE_PREFIX/service.conf -s stop && printf 'Nginx stopped
' >> SERVICE_PREFIX/service.log 2>&1
